questions.question_text: What is the platform name for the User table?

discussion.content: It should be D sys_user, no sys_users in SNOW

Selected Answer: D
The platform name for the User table in ServiceNow is sys_user. This table stores information about the users in the system.

To create a new notification template to notify users affected by network outages at their site in ServiceNow, you would typically use:

B. Administration > Notification Overview

This module provides an overview of all notifications in the system and allows administrators to create, edit, and manage notification templates. From here, you can create a new notification template specifically tailored to notify users affected by network outages.

Selected Answer: A
I use different path and always remove filter set on the list , but yeah it is A.

Selected Answer: A
A:
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-platform-administration/page/administer/notification/task/t_CreateANotification.html

Selected Answer: A

questions.question_text: Your customer would like to create a new template to notify users who are affected by network outages at their site. Which module would you use to create a new notification?
When designing a flow, how do you reference data from a record, in that flow?

choices.C: Specify the source table on the data pill related list
choices.E: Add the table reference using the slush bucket
choices.D: Drag the data pill onto the flow definition
choices.A: Drag the table icon onto the flow definition
choices.B: Use the condition builder to specify the desired values

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D DATA PILL
D is the correct answer

questions.question_text: On the Reports page, what sections allow you to see which reports are visible to different audiences? (Choose four.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ACFI
There are only 4 categories in the View/run module my reports, group, global, and all
